item.title: By: Paul Harrison
item.dc:creator: Paul Harrison
item.description: <p>Matt and Julian, <br /><br />Alas I can't join you and the other Lotusbeer'ers for drinks next week, which is a real pity, as it's been a while since I've sampled the good beer selection at The Market Porter . . .<br /><br />Have yourselves a great evening.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt and Julian,

Alas I can’t join you and the other Lotusbeer’ers for drinks next week, which is a real pity, as it’s been a while since I’ve sampled the good beer selection at The Market Porter . . .

Have yourselves a great evening.

item.title: By: Philip Storry
item.dc:creator: Philip Storry
item.description: <p>Whilst the main LotusBeer event is obviously held in Aberdeen, I don't see what's wrong with London holding a "LotusBeer Comes To You" event...<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /><br /><br />I don't know what shift I'm on that week, but will try to make it.<br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Whilst the main LotusBeer event is obviously held in Aberdeen, I don’t see what’s wrong with London holding a “LotusBeer Comes To You” event…

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />

I don’t know what shift I’m on that week, but will try to make it.

item.title: By: Turtle
item.dc:creator: Turtle
item.description: <p>You should have the LobsterSphere shirts, too.</p>
item.content:encoded: You should have the LobsterSphere shirts, too.

item.title: By: Ian Bradbury
item.dc:creator: Ian Bradbury
item.description: <p>Cool. Market Porer works for me - I'm based in London Bridge!</p>
item.content:encoded: Cool. Market Porer works for me – I’m based in London Bridge!
